main

Class NoCarchitecture

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.NoCarchitecture

  • public class NoCarchitecture
extends java.lang.Object
    Is the class containing the NoC architecture description and all its features including:
    • The routing strategy
    • The optical router architecture
    • The network topology

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NoCarchitecture()
      Constructs a NoC architecture including the routing strategy, the optical router architecture and the network topology.
      NoCarchitecture(javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
      Constructs a NoC architecture including the routing strategy, the optical router architecture and the network topology.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NoCarchitecture

        public NoCarchitecture()
        Constructs a NoC architecture including the routing strategy, the optical router architecture and the network topology.

      • NoCarchitecture

        public NoCarchitecture(javax.swing.JTextArea textArea)
        Constructs a NoC architecture including the routing strategy, the optical router architecture and the network topology. It also print in the text area inside the GUI some information about the architecture configuration loading.
        Parameters:
        textArea - textArea the multi-line area used in the GUI to displays the information about the architecture configuration loading.

    • Method Detail

      • setValidCommunications

        public void setValidCommunications()
        Sets up the valid communications data structure.

      • checkNoCsize

        public boolean checkNoCsize(Application app)
        Checks the size of the NoC in terms of number of tiles and compares it with the number of cores of the application
        Parameters:
        app - The application
        Returns:
        true if the number of cores is greater than the number of tiles; false otherwise

      • getReadableRepresentation

        public java.lang.String getReadableRepresentation()
        Returns:
        a String object containing a formatted representations of the NoC architecture.

      • getPowerLoss

        public double getPowerLoss(int src,
                  int dst)
        Parameters:
        src - The source tile
        dst - The destination tile
        Returns:
        The power loss that affects the communication between src and dst

      • getCrosstalk

        public double getCrosstalk(int src,
                  int dst,
                  int src_noise,
                  int dst_noise)
        Parameters:
        src - The source tile
        dst - The destination tile
        src_noise - The source of the signal generating crosstalk
        dst_noise - The destination of the signal generating crosstalk
        Returns:
        The crosstalk that affects the communication between src and dst tiles due to the communication between src_noise and dst_noise tiles.
